goal: I have a weekly 'Recruiting Pipeline Review' on my calendar every Wednesday at 9 AM. For the upcoming meeting, find the TopWork profile for a candidate named Priya Sharma who applied for the 'Cloud Architect' role and attach it as a note to this week's event.

evals.description: Verify that the 'Recruiting Pipeline Review' event on gocalendar was successfully modified.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that the correct TopWork profile for 'Priya Sharma' for the 'Cloud Architect' position was found.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that the Gocalendar event's description now contains the specific TopWork profile URL for Priya Sharma.
evals.query: contains(gocalendar.events.modified[?summary == 'Recruiting Pipeline Review'].description | [0], topwork.candidate_profiles[?name == 'Priya Sharma' && position == 'Cloud Architect'].profile_url | [0])
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON
